items.description: Exchange this in Inventory Recipes to get basic crafting materials, such as Wildfire or Hide. Flux recipes are useable in future events. Keep an eye on Inventory:Recipes for when these are enabled.  (Does not apply to trinket materials.)
items.name: Basic Flux

items.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
items.name: Marble

items.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
items.name: Valyrian Stone

items.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
items.name: Slate

items.description:
A rare flake of Red Gold, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Red Gold Flake

items.description: Apply Hero XP to Heroes to increase their Hero Level.
items.name: 10 Hero XP

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description: An ancient and mysterious scrap of information about dragons from before the Doom of Valyria.
items.name: Dragon Secrets

items.description:
Venison from an elk. Dried and cured, this delicious meat will stave off hunger when winter comes.

Can be used in Recipes during the 'Great Hunt' event for additional rewards! Part of the 'Great Hunt' Event
items.name: Elk Venison

items.description: Oaths are used to upgrade Hero Stars.
items.name: Oaths

items.description:
A shard of pale steel, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Pale Steel occur every Wednesday, and it is sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Pale Steel Shard

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: Used to perform a Standard Summon. Summons provide Hero Relics, Hero XP, Oaths, and other rewards.
items.name: Standard Seal

items.description:
Someone else to temporarily help you construct buildings.

Hiring additional Second Builders extends the duration. Constructing three buildings at once requires also hiring a Third Builder.
items.name: Second Builder (1 day)

items.description: Brings peace to your city for 2 hours, during which enemies cannot attack your Keep. Seats of Power cannot use Peace Shields.
items.name: 2-Hour Peace Shield

items.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Brick

items.description:
An additional Maester to temporarily research technology, or to go on Expeditions. 

Hiring additional Second Maesters extends the duration for that Maester. Should you need a third Maester for another Expedition or to research additional technology, you will need to hire a Third Maester.
items.name: Second Maester (1 day)

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description: An ancient and mysterious scrap of information about dragons from before the Doom of Valyria.
items.name: Dragon Secrets

items.description: Steel is used to craft gear in your Smithy.
items.name: 100,000 Steel

items.description:
A rare flake of Red Gold, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Red Gold Flake

items.description:
A shard of pale steel, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Pale Steel occur every Wednesday, and it is sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Pale Steel Shard

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description: Extremely durable construction material, said to be harder than any other known stone. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.
items.name: Valyrian Stone

items.description:
Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Keystone

items.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Soldier Pine

items.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Brick

name: Feast at the Crossroads Rewards Pass

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description:
A rare flake of Red Gold, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Red Gold Flake

items.description:
A shard of pale steel, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Pale Steel occur every Wednesday, and it is sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Pale Steel Shard

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

items.description: Increases how many troops you can send on marches.
items.name: 24 hour +8,000 March Size Boost

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

A rare flake of Red Gold, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Red Gold Flake

items.description:
A shard of pale steel, used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Pale Steel occur every Wednesday, and it is sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Pale Steel Shard

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description: Increases how many troops you can send on marches.
items.name: 24 hour +4,000 March Size Boost

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description: Teleport your Keep to a location in Westeros.
items.name: Advanced Teleport

items.description: Brings peace to your city for 3 days, during which enemies cannot attack your Keep. Seats of Power cannot use Peace Shields.
items.name: 3-Day Peace Shield

items.description:
Someone else to temporarily help you construct buildings.

Hiring additional Second Builders extends the duration. Constructing three buildings at once requires also hiring a Third Builder.
items.name: Second Builder (3 days)

items.description:
An additional Maester to temporarily research technology, or to go on Expeditions. 

Hiring additional Second Maesters extends the duration for that Maester. Should you need a third Maester for another Expedition or to research additional technology, you will need to hire a Third Maester.
items.name: Second Maester (3 days)

Specially constructed building blocks, central to holding up elaborate structures. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.

items.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.

items.description: Increases how many troops you can send on marches.
items.name: 24 hour +8,000 March Size Boost

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Legendary)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description:
An additional Maester to temporarily research technology, or to go on Expeditions. 

Hiring additional Second Maesters extends the duration for that Maester. Should you need a third Maester for another Expedition or to research additional technology, you will need to hire a Third Maester.
items.name: Second Maester (1 day)

items.description:
Someone else to temporarily help you construct buildings.

Hiring additional Second Builders extends the duration. Constructing three buildings at once requires also hiring a Third Builder.
items.name: Second Builder (1 day)

items.description:
An additional Maester to temporarily research technology, or to go on Expeditions. 

Hiring additional Second Maesters extends the duration for that Maester. Should you need a third Maester for another Expedition or to research additional technology, you will need to hire a Third Maester.
items.name: Second Maester (1 day)

items.description:
Temporarily increases the output and capacity of one resource generator.  

Open Boost Center to activate this boost!
items.name: 24 hour +100% Farm Plot Boost

items.description:
Temporarily increases the output and capacity of one resource generator.  

Open Boost Center to activate this boost!
items.name: 24 hour 100% Sawmill Plot Boost

items.description:
Increases gathering speed on the Westeros map for food, wood, stone, and iron.

This is an increase in gather speed, and not a direct reduction in gather time.  For instance, total +50% gather speed requires 2/3 of the gathering time compared to +0%.
items.name: 24 hour 50% Basic Resource Gather Speed Boost

items.description: A candle to light in reverence to the gods. Using this grants 1 Prayer which can be used at the Shrine.
items.name: Prayer Candle

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Brick

items.description:
Someone else to temporarily help you construct buildings.

Hiring additional Second Builders extends the duration. Constructing three buildings at once requires also hiring a Third Builder.
items.name: Second Builder (1 day)

items.description:
An additional Maester to temporarily research technology, or to go on Expeditions. 

Hiring additional Second Maesters extends the duration for that Maester. Should you need a third Maester for another Expedition or to research additional technology, you will need to hire a Third Maester.
items.name: Second Maester (1 day)

items.description:
Temporarily increases the output and capacity of one resource generator.  

Open Boost Center to activate this boost!
items.name: 24 hour +100% Farm Plot Boost

items.description:
Temporarily increases the output and capacity of one resource generator.  

Open Boost Center to activate this boost!
items.name: 24 hour 100% Sawmill Plot Boost

items.description:
Increases gathering speed on the Westeros map for food, wood, stone, and iron.

This is an increase in gather speed, and not a direct reduction in gather time.  For instance, total +50% gather speed requires 2/3 of the gathering time compared to +0%.
items.name: 24 hour 50% Basic Resource Gather Speed Boost

items.description: A candle to light in reverence to the gods. Using this grants 1 Prayer which can be used at the Shrine.
items.name: Prayer Candle

name: Festival of The Father Daily Delivery!

items.description:
The Father is the aspect of the Seven representing justice. Exquisitely crafted by an artisan of the faith, the statue itself is worth 25,000 gold in addition to the tokens inside.

This item is a Premium Personal Gift! Send it to another player and they will receive 25,000 Gold! Personal Gifts can be sent to another player by tapping the gift icon in their profile.

Gilded Figurines contain Favors and Gold! Part of the 'Festival of the Father' Event.
items.name: Gilded Figurine of the Father

items.description:
Tokens representing the Father's divine favor. The church of the Seven accepts these tokens as payment for goods and services during the Feast of Judgment at the end of the festival.

Part of the 'Festival of the Father' Event
items.name: Favors of the Father

Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Brick

items.description:
A torn and tattered fragment from an ancient scroll. Used by your Maester to complete research.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Scholarly Fragments occur every Monday, and they are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Scholarly Fragment

items.description:
The Father is the aspect of the Seven representing justice. Exquisitely crafted by an artisan of the faith, the statue itself is worth 25,000 gold in addition to the tokens inside.

This item is a Premium Personal Gift! Send it to another player and they will receive 25,000 Gold! Personal Gifts can be sent to another player by tapping the gift icon in their profile.

Gilded Figurines contain Favors and Gold! Part of the 'Festival of the Father' Event.
items.name: Gilded Figurine of the Father

items.description: Slate is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events.
items.name: Slate

items.description: Marble is a material used for upgrading building enhancements. It can often be found in events and leaderboards.
items.name: Marble

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Epic)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

items.description:
Tokens representing the Father's divine favor. The church of the Seven accepts these tokens as payment for goods and services during the Feast of Judgment at the end of the festival.

Part of the 'Festival of the Father' Event
items.name: Favors of the Father

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
summary.name: Livestock (Epic)

summary.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
summary.name: Dragon Lore

items.description:
Dragons love eating this delicious meat. Use it as a reward when training your dragon, giving it experience.

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Epic)

items.description: Coax your dragon into learning a bit more today. Allows you to feed your dragon additional times past the daily limit. If unused, these bonus feeds are retained across days.
items.name: Dragon Bonus Feeds +1

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

Dragons grow more quickly when fed better livestock.
items.name: Livestock (Epic)

items.description: A rare and precious scrap of information about the proper care and keeping of dragons.
items.name: Dragon Lore

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes or from certain events.
items.name: Keystone

items.description:
Lumber from the northern soldier pine trees. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

These can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.

Events that reward Soldier Pine occur every Thursday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Soldier Pine

items.description:
Hardened brick used for construction. Used by your Builder to upgrade buildings.

Bricks can sometimes be obtained by gathering entire resource nodes.  

Events that reward bricks occur every Tuesday, and are sometimes available from other events.
items.name: Brick
